data.description:
`{{forms}}` object available to pages and components with forms

**Handlebars Expression** {{forms.edit_account}}

shipping_fields.description: Array of form fields that define each shipping address for this customer; for details, see this [repo] (https://github.com/bigcommerce/cornerstone/tree/master/templates/components/common/forms)

action.description: URL to the proper handler (Update Address versus Save New Address).

error.description: Message to display when form entry fails (defined by the BigCommerce App).

recaptcha.description: Objects for integrating the Google reCAPTCHA service to distinguish human visitors from ’bots (automated agents).

enabled.description: Boolean indicating whether reCAPTCHA is enabled for this store.

public_key.description: Public key (site key) that reCAPTCHA returns upon merchant’s enabling CAPTCHA security in Store Settings > Display Settings.

address_fields.description: Array of form fields that define each shipping address for this customer; for details, see this [repo] (https://github.com/bigcommerce/cornerstone/tree/master/templates/components/common/forms):

class_name.description: Specifies a CSS class to apply to a field within the array; for corresponding control-panel steps, [see](https://support.bigcommerce.com/articles/Public/Editing-Form-Fields#advanced-settings):

account_fields.description: Object of form fields; for details, see this repo: https://github.com/bigcommerce/cornerstone/tree/master/templates/components/common/forms

error.description: BCApp generated message to display when customer’s account creation fails.

checking_out.description: Boolean indicating whether customer created the account during a purchase checkout.

first_name.description: First name of the customer being edited

last_name.description: Last name of the customer being edited

company_name.description: Company of the customer being edited.

phone.description: Phone number of the customer being edited

error.description: Message to display (generated by the BigCommerce App) when customer’s account edit fails.

success.description: Message to display (generated by the BigCommerce App) when customer’s account edit succeeds

error.description: BigCommerce defined message to display when customer’s login action fails.

success.description: BigCommerce defined message to display when customer’s login action succeeds.

enabled.description: Returns 1 when reCAPTCHA is enabled and 0 when it's disabled within the BigCommerce control panel.

public_key.description: Optional key used for all reCAPTCHA in your store if specified in the BigCommerce control panel.

is_public.description: Boolean indicating whether this wishlist is displayed to other store visitors.

errors.description: Message to display when form entry fails (generated by the BigCommerce App).

actions.description: URL to the proper handler (Update Wish List versus Save New Wish List).
